common.network.error.ban_alert.title: About Your Game Status
common.network.error.ban_alert.descripti:
Suspected violations of the terms of use have been detected.

▼ Examples of improper or prohibited behavior
・Using external tools
・Account sharing
・Harassing other users
・Intentionally exploiting game glitches
・Other acts that violate laws, regulations, or terms of use

Please play the game in compliance with the terms of use.
Thank you for your cooperation.

please perform data linkage and then restart the application.

Do you want to delete user data stored on the device?

If user data deletion is performed, the game can be restarted

tutorial.select.description2: ※ You can choose other idols to train from the second time onward.
tutorial.idol.select_description: Confirm starting to train this idol?\n※ You can train other idols later
tutorial.skip.title: Skip Tutorial
tutorial.skip.description: Do you want to skip the tutorial?
tutorial.idol_receive.warning_stage: ※ Receive the initial state of the training idol
tutorial.idol_receive.description_2: This idol has been received.\n<color=#u:Strong>It will be converted to 「{0}」, confirm?</color>
tutorial.idol_receive.attention_1: Receive the initial state of the training idol\nCannot change once received
tutorial.idol_receive.attention_3: Training idol will be automatically received

help.overlay.title: Help
notice.notice_sheet.title: Notice
terms.terms_sheet.title: Agreement Confirmation
terms.terms_sheet.description:
Please agree to the {0} to use this service.
Minors need the consent of a legal representative (such as a parent).

※ If unclear,
show this screen to your family.
terms.terms_sheet.description.update: {0} has been updated.\nPlease confirm and agree to continue using School Idol Master.
app_tracking_transparency_sheet.title: Please Help Allow Tracking
app_tracking_transparency_sheet.descript:
Thank you for choosing this app. After tapping 'Next', a tracking permission dialog will appear.
Allowing tracking will show you advertisements from Bandai Namco Group that may interest you.

【How to Allow Tracking】
Select allow in the displayed dialog
※ You can change tracking settings anytime in your device settings
fangage_sheet.title: About Customer Information Handling
fangage_sheet.summary.text:
We will collect some customer information related to your use of this service.
Please consent to this information being used for advertising and analysis purposes, and provided to BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment Inc. (hereinafter referred to as 'BNE') and other third parties.
For more details on the recipients and the collected information, please refer to the items in each tab. For more information on BNE's privacy policy, please check <link="https://legal.bandainamcoent.co.jp/privacy/?lang=jp"><color="blue"><u>Privacy Policy</u></color></link>.
This consent is voluntary, and you can continue to use this service even if you do not agree to the above use. You can also withdraw your consent at any time on the relevant page of this service.
Tapping the [Agree] button below means you agree to the above purposes of using your information.
fangage_sheet.description: ※ Checking each item indicates consent, unchecking indicates withdrawal of consent.
setting.top.title: Settings
setting.preference.noti.daily.descriptio: Enable to receive a notification at 19:00 if daily tasks are not completed.
setting.preference.noti.midnight.descrip: Enable to not receive game notifications during the set time.
setting.preference.live.camera.descripti: Enable to reverse camera actions during live recording.
Enable to display an alert when the total purchase amount exceeds {0:N0} yen per month.
setting.quality.frame_rate.description: The higher the value, the smoother the display.\nIf prioritizing frame rate, it is recommended to lower the quality setting by one level.
setting.quality.reflection.description: Reflection effect quality can be set.
setting.quality.detail.description: Detail display level of some 3D models like audience can be set.
setting.quality.system.description: Settings other than resolution, reflection quality, and detail settings can be set.
setting.quality.supplement: Higher settings may cause slow operation and increased power consumption.\nIf prioritizing quality settings, it is recommended to set the frame rate to 30fps.
setting.produce.produce_voice_off.descri: Display a confirmation message for voice dialogue playback at the start of training.
setting.produce.skip_forward_setting.des: Display a confirmation message for dialogue skip settings.
setting.produce.lesson_stamina_low_alert: Display a confirmation message when idol's stamina is low.
setting.produce.turn_end.description: Display a confirmation message when the turn skip button is tapped.
setting.produce.exam_effect_warning.desc: Display a confirmation message when the skill card effect cannot be activated.
setting.produce.reward_card_reroll_confi: Display a confirmation message when rerolling skill cards.
setting.produce.reward_card_select_confi: Display a confirmation message when not all skill cards are selected.
setting.produce.present_skip.description: Display a confirmation message when P drink is not received.
setting.produce.shop_point_low_alert.des: Display a confirmation message when P points are insufficient at the start of consultation.
setting.produce.exit_shop_confirm.descri: Display a confirmation message when ending consultation.
setting.produce.stamina_alert: Display a warning screen when idol's stamina is low
setting.produce.navi.resident.descriptio: If disabled, navigation advice will not be displayed during training.
setting.produce.skip_explanation.start: If disabled, explanation will be omitted\nduring training and the selected schedule will start immediately.
setting.produce.story_text_speed.title: Playback Speed
setting.produce.story_text_speed.descrip: In intimacy dialogue or training dialogue, text will be displayed at the set speed.
setting.produce.live_skip.description: If disabled, a confirmation message will not be displayed during live skip in training.
others.top.title: Others
others.top.button.fund_settlement: Display According to Fund Settlement Act
others.top.button.commercial_transaction: Display According to Specific Commercial Transaction Act
faq_confirm_sheet.title: Confirmation
faq_confirm_sheet.description: Open the FAQ page? ※ Will launch the web browser
twitter_confirm_sheet.title: Confirmation
twitter_confirm_sheet.description: Open the official X (formerly Twitter) page?\n※ Will launch the web browser
inquiry_confirm_sheet.title: Confirmation
inquiry_confirm_sheet.description: Customer ID is required for inquiries.\nPlease copy the user ID and proceed with the inquiry.
account_delete.confirm.title: Account Deletion Request
account_delete.confirm.description:
■ Notes (※ Please read carefully)
・Game data will be deleted and no operations will be possible.
・Current paid/unpaid jewels will disappear.
・Bandai Namco ID game data inheritance settings
　will be canceled.
・Accounts deleted through this function cannot be restored.
account_delete.confirm.warning: Deleted accounts cannot be restored\nSelecting “Confirm” will launch an external browser and redirect to the support website's application window
jewel_balance_sheet.title: Jewel Balance Confirmation
jewel_balance_sheet.description: Free jewels will be consumed first.\nAdditionally, paid jewels will be consumed in the order of acquisition time.
jewel_buy_limit_sheet.title: Age-Based Purchase Limit
jewel_buy_limit_sheet.description: Purchase limits are set based on age when purchasing in-app currency, etc.
maintenance.release.title: Service Preparing
maintenance.release.description: Please wait a moment, service will start soon
data.linkage.first_confirm.title: Data Linkage
data.linkage.first_confirm.description: By linking game data with Bandai Namco ID, you can continue to use the same data on different devices.\nLog in to Bandai Namco ID and link data?
data.linkage.first_confirm.warning: The game data currently being played is already linked with Bandai Namco ID.\nBy logging in to Bandai Namco ID, you can release the link or link with another Bandai Namco ID
data.linkage.success.title: Data Linkage Completed
data.linkage.release_other.description: The logged-in account is already linked with the following game data.\nRelease the link and re-link with the current game data being played?
data.linkage.release_other.description2: ※ Only one game data can be linked to one account
data.linkage.release_other.warning: After releasing the link, this game data may not be recoverable\nTo link this game data, select “Data Linkage” on the title screen
data.linkage.link.title: Data Linkage Confirmation
data.linkage.link.description: Link release completed.\nRe-link the current game data being played with the account?
data.linkage.update.title: Data Linkage ID Update
data.linkage.update.description: The current data being played is linked with a different ID from the logged-in Bandai Namco ID. Release the link\nand re-link the game data with the logged-in account?
data.release.title: Data Linkage Release Confirmation
data.release.description: The current data being played is linked with the logged-in Bandai Namco ID. Release the link?
data.release.description2: ※ To link with other game data\n　You need to release the current data linkage
data.release.success.title: Data Linkage Release Completed
data.migrate.start.title: Data Linkage
data.migrate.start.description: If you already have an account, select to link.
data.migrate.start.warning: ※ Paid jewels cannot be linked to a different operating system. They can only be used on the purchased OS.\n※ Free jewels can be linked to a different OS.
data.migrate.no_link.title: No Linked Data
data.migrate.no_link.description: The logged-in account has no linked game data.\n\nPlease perform account linkage in the "Data Linkage" menu within the game.
data.migrate.same_user.title: Data Already Linked
data.migrate.same_user.description: The logged-in account is already linked with the current game data.
data.migrate.confirm.title: Data Linkage Confirmation
data.migrate.confirm.description: The logged-in account is linked with the following game data.\nLink this game data?
data.migrate.last_confirm.description: The following data currently being played will be overwritten,\nand cannot be restored. Are you sure?
data.migrate.last_confirm.warning: ※ Paid jewels cannot be linked to a different operating system.\nThey can only be used on the purchased OS.\n※ Free jewels can be linked to a different OS.
data.migrate.success.title: Data Linkage Completed
data.migrate.success.description: Data linkage completed.\nReturning to the title screen.
dearness.dearness_level_up_receive.overl: ※ Obtained/enhanced intimacy effects will be applied during the next training
seminar.sheet.retry_description: Restart the current training from the beginning?
seminar.sheet.retire_description: <color=#u:Negative>Exit will delete ongoing training data</color>\nExit and return to the training homepage?
seminar.sheet.produce_play_description: Temporarily interrupt training to start the seminar?
seminar.sheet.produce_back_alert: If not continued, training will be interrupted and return to the home screen.
seminar.sheet.produce_retire_alert: Exiting will delete ongoing training data.
seminar.clear_overlay.title: Seminar

Retry?
